data.comment: The match is underway at Vicarage Road.
Watford move into a 1-0 lead through a Craig Cathcart header.
In the minute 11, Ken Sema with an assist there.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 66, Glenn Murray is replacing Ken Sema for Watford at Vicarage Road.
The home team have replaced Kiko Femenia with Marc Navarro. This is the second substitution made today by Vladan Ivic.
Middlesbrough make their first substitution with Lewis Wing replacing George Saville.
In the minute 85, Ben Wilmot is booked for the home team.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team replace Domingos Quina with Daniel Phillips.
